Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Yes, I’m just a lowly bug doctor. This Xenoplague discovery is no bug. Until witnessing the Alpha Strain’s parasitic mutation from spore to organized creature, I would’ve said no other living creature had as much success spreading across worlds as insectoids. Now I see that even the Pustule exhibits a wicked determination to assimilate all life forms. It’s too dangerous. You can’t contain its spurts of infectious bile. Quarantine your world. It will spread. What you are unleashing upon the universe could end us all. God have mercy if someone weaponized it ”—Professor R. Lin’l “Bugman” Bunson, “RV-022S: Xenoplague Discovery Analysis”

“没错，我只是个卑微的虫类博士。经过调查发现，这场异星疫病并非虫类引起。在随后的调查中，我们亲眼目睹初始毒株发生寄生变异，从孢子变为有组织的生物，我认为没有活体生物能像昆虫类一样快速传播至各个世界。现在就连脓疱也表现出了一种消灭所有生命体的决心，它喷吐出的汁液能够夺走你的性命。将你的世界隔离起来，不然它会继续传播，你正在向宇宙散布的东西会为所有生物带来末日，希望不会有人将它制成武器。”- R.林“昆虫人”邦森教授，“RV-022S：异星疫病发现分析”

“It’s amazing how much of my advice gets ignored all because the best thing I can advise is to run away. If you ever see a large overinflated pustule separate itself from other Xenoplague pustules and approach, RUN! You can’t make friends with an infectious plague. Diplomatic Envoy Derwinnivik thought he could. That’s why he died. As did the rest of his company that ignored my warning and surrounded that swollen undulating snot-ball. What did it do? It exploded! Boom! All of them died or were infected. It’s why they eventually quarantined Sunkist-II.”—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-4000X: Vacation Hotspots”

“就因为我的建议是尽快逃跑，所以我惨遭了所有人的无视，这可真是讽刺。如果你见到一大坨巨大的脓疱正从其他异性疫病脓疱中分离，并向你靠近，快跑！这种疫病可不是来和你交朋友的。外交官恩沃·德温尼维克认为自己能够与它和睦相处，所以他死了。至于他的那些无视了我的警告，继续围绕在那个肿胀的大球周围的同伴们，当然也死了。它是怎么做到的？它爆开了！嘭！周围的人要么直接死去，要么惨遭感染。这就是必须隔离桑基斯特-II 的原因。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-4000X：假期热点”

“Eureka! I’ve done it. My research shows how to mutate stable Pustule specimens into more powerful living weapons. The common mutation, spontaneous infectious self-destruction, is no longer its preferred evolutionary path. Uploading the procedures to Xenolab’s research cloud… Wait… There’s a disruption in the specimen cages. I hear screaming. Activate monitors. My creations breached the safety interlocks. So beautifully clever! So lethal! They’re destroying my offices. Quarantine this planet. My beloved Eva, continue my research. Don’t weep. This is the price of scientific breakthroughs. Oh! And don’t forget: Use acid-resistant restraining collars.”—Dr. Felix Berg, “RV-165S: Xenolabs Research”

“很好！我做到了。我的研究表明，将稳定的脓疱变异为更加强力的活体武器是可行的。普通的变异，自发性感染性的自我摧毁，将不再被其视为进化道路。正在将变异步骤上传至异星实验室的云计算研究中心......等一下......样本牢笼中出现了混乱，我听到了尖叫声。激活监控系统。我的造物突破了安全联锁，它们是那么的聪明！那么的致命！它们正在摧毁我的办公室，隔离这颗星球。亲爱的爱娃，继续我的研究，不要哭泣，这是科学进步的必要代价。哦！别忘了，要使用抗酸材质制成的项圈。”- 菲利克斯·柏格博士，“RV-165S：异星实验室研究”

“Specimen T-23, affectionately known in the Xenolab as Plague Lord, has an impressive array of deadly attacks. It launched a tree-sized spike into an armored tank with devastating effectiveness. The testers activating the target were infected with Xenoplague. Its savage strength enables it to launch lethal tentacle spikes at flying enemies with deadly accuracy. The Plague Lord’s control over infected fallen allows it to animate expired enemies. With a simple inoculation of training serum and 32 million credits, you can unveil this terrifying new weapon in your next military engagement.”—Dr. Terrence Weiss, “RV-3488M: Xenoplague Weapons Mastery”

“样本 T-23，在异星实验室被亲切地称为疫病领主，拥有多种致命的攻击方式。它能够发射树木大小的尖刺，威力足以刺穿坦克装甲。测试员正在激活受到异星疫病感染的实验体。它强大的力量使其能够精准地利用触手尖刺攻击到飞行的敌人。疫病领主能够控制被感染的生物，即使该生物已经死去。只需简单地接种一针训练血清，并支付三千两百万，你就能在下次的军事行动中使用这个可怕的新武器。”- 特伦斯·怀斯博士，“RV-3488：异星疫病武器精通”
